title: Flipped Learning-Based Core Nursing Skill Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Flipped learning application within a graduate nursing education program, in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve 90% accuracy in four core nursing skills—blood pressure measurement (BCM), drug preparation (DP), etc.—via flipped learning.
Learners complete at least 80% of pre-learning materials (videos/summaries) to engage in active practice during class.
Learners maintain over 75% knowledge retention in follow-up assessments three months post-course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
